description: Retrieve all files for a specific skill by skill_id. Returns file metadata and content for all files associated with the skill including Python scripts, JSON configs, and data files.

configuration.query: FROM agent_skill_files | WHERE skill_id == ?skill_id | KEEP skill_id, file_name, file_path, file_type, file_content

skill_id.description: Skill identifier to retrieve files for (e.g., 'verify-expense-policy', 'adjudicate-storm-claim')
